trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<select>" name="<select>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Permite o acesso programático a HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<select>" name="<select>" href=""> </xref> elemento no servidor.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlSelect control to create a selection box.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o controlo de HtmlSelect para criar uma caixa de seleção.

trans-unit.source: Specify item listings in the control by placing HTML `<option>` elements between the opening and closing `<select>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Especifique as listagens de item no controlo colocando HTML `<option>` elementos entre a abertura e fecho `<select>` etiquetas.

trans-unit.source: Each item is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada item é representada por um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=fullName>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify the text that is displayed for each item in the control, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the item, or simply place text between the opening and closing `<option>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar o texto que é apresentado para cada item no controlo, pode definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do item ou simplesmente local texto entre a abertura e fecho `<option>` etiquetas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the item, you can associate a value with the item that is different from the text.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do item, pode associar um valor com o item que é diferente do texto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To select an item from the list by default, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the item to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar um item da lista, por predefinição, defina o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do item para `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance and behavior of the HtmlSelect control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode controlar o aspeto e o comportamento do controlo HtmlSelect definindo a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property specifies the height (in rows) of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>propriedade especifica a altura (em linhas) do controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property specifies whether more than one item can be concurrently selected in the HtmlSelect control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>propriedade especifica se mais de um item pode ser seleccionado em simultâneo no controlo HtmlSelect.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the HtmlSelect control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o controlo de HtmlSelect é apresentado como uma caixa de lista pendente.

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se permitir que vários seleções (definindo a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>propriedade para `true`) ou especificar uma altura maior do que uma linha (definindo a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>propriedade para um valor superior ao `1`), o controlo é apresentado como uma caixa de listagem.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected item in a single-selection HtmlSelect control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property to get the index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o item seleccionado num controlo de HtmlSelect de seleção única, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade para obter o índice do item selecionado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then use this value to retrieve the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, pode utilizar este valor para obter o item a partir de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items from an HtmlSelect control that allows multiple selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar os itens selecionados a partir de um controlo de HtmlSelect que permite que vários seleções, itere através de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção e teste a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de cada item.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HtmlSelect class provides two properties to support data binding.
trans-unit.target: A classe de HtmlSelect fornece duas propriedades para suportar o enlace de dados.

trans-unit.source: To bind data to any object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>), or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Para vincular dados para qualquer objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>interface (tais como <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>), ou o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interface, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>propriedade para especificar a origem de dados à qual vincular.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding.
trans-unit.target: Quando configurar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>propriedade, manualmente tem de escrever o código para efetuar o enlace de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To automatically bind an HtmlSelect control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property and set its value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control to use.
trans-unit.target: Para vincular automaticamente um controlo HtmlSelect a uma origem de dados representada por um controlo de origem de dados, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade e defina o respetivo valor o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>propriedade do controlo de origem de dados a utilizar.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, the HtmlSelect control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando configurar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade, o controlo de HtmlSelect automaticamente está vinculado ao controlo de origem de dados especificada.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, não terá de chamar explicitamente o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify which fields in the data source bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of an item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Também pode especificar os campos na origem de dados de enlace para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades de um item de controlo, definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>Propriedades, respetivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sources of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify the specific source to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Se a origem de dados contém várias origens de dados, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>propriedade para especificar a origem específica para vincular ao controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se tiver um <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>objeto com várias tabelas, tem de especificar que tabela para o enlace para o controlo com o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlSelect, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de HtmlSelect, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra o valor da propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|The "select" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>| A cadeia de literal "select". |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a parsed child control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um controlo subordinado analisado o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The AddParsedSubObject method is used by ASP.NET to add parsed child controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O método AddParsedSubObject é utilizado pelo ASP.NET para adicionar controlos subordinados analisada para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The parsed child control to add.
trans-unit.target: O controlo subordinado analisado para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The child control specified by the obj parameter must be of the type .
trans-unit.target: O controlo subordinado especificado pelo obj parâmetro tem de ser do tipo .

trans-unit.source: Clears the list selection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of all items to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a seleção de lista do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo e define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade de todos os itens a <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ClearSelection method iterates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object to `false`.
trans-unit.target: O método ClearSelection itera através o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>coleção representado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>propriedade e define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>propriedade de cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>object `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"> </xref> do objeto para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control does not allow child controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo não permite controlos subordinados.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> to contain the current server control's child server controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> para conter controlos de servidor de subordinados do controlo de servidor atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the set of data to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control from a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*> property with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conjunto de dados à qual vincular o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlar a partir de um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>propriedade com vários conjuntos de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property contains multiple sets of data, use the DataMember property to specify which set of data to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>propriedade contém vários conjuntos de dados, utilize a propriedade DataMember para especificar que conjunto de dados para vincular ao controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, use this property to indicate which table to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se tiver um <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>objeto com várias tabelas, utilize esta propriedade para indicar que tabela para vincular ao controlo.</xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After you have specified the data source to bind to the control, you can then specify which fields from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of each item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Depois de especificar a origem de dados para vincular ao controlo, em seguida, pode especificar que campos da origem de dados à qual vincular o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades de cada item no controlo, definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>Propriedades, respetivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The set of data to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control from a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*> with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de dados à qual vincular o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlar a partir de um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>com vários conjuntos de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates the property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é uma cadeia vazia (""), que indica a propriedade não foi definido.

trans-unit.source: The DataMember property is set during the data-binding phase of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataMember é definida durante a fase de enlace de dados do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source of information to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a origem de informações para criar o enlace a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSource property to specify the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de origem de dados para especificar a origem de dados à qual vincular o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: A data source must be a collection that implements either the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Uma origem de dados tem de ser uma coleção que implementa o o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>interface (tais como <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, ou <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) ou o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the DataSource property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir a propriedade de origem de dados, tem de escrever manualmente o código para efetuar o enlace de dados.

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sets of data, such as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify which data set to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Se a origem de dados contém vários conjuntos de dados, tais como um <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>objeto com várias tabelas, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>propriedade para especificar que conjunto de dados para vincular ao controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can specify which fields from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of each item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar que campos da origem de dados à qual vincular o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades de cada item no controlo, definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>Propriedades, respetivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade automaticamente vinculada a uma origem de dados representada por um controlo de origem de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando configurar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade, dados listagem automaticamente o controlo está vinculado ao controlo de origem de dados especificada.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.

trans-unit.target: O controlo de origem de dados tem de existir no mesmo contentor de nomenclatura que o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo que faça referência a este ou num controlo principal do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind*> method.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo requer o enlace de dados e de que é especificado um controlo de origem de dados válida antes de chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind*>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET automatically binds the data listing control to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade, o ASP.NET vincula automaticamente os dados de lista de controlo para o controlo de origem de dados especificada.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET performs data binding for the control, it calls the EnsureDataBound method first to verify that the control has not already been data-bound and that a valid data source control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface is specified for its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando ASP.NET efetua o enlace de dados para o controlo, chama o método EnsureDataBound primeiro para verificar se o controlo não tiver já sido vinculado a dados e que uma origem de dados válido controla que implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>interface é especificada para o respetivo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The EnsureDataBound method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to ensure that the control is data-bound immediately after the call to this method.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, chama o método EnsureDataBound o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>método para se certificar de que o controlo está vinculado a dados imediatamente após a chamada para este método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object that represents the data source that is bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>objeto que representa a origem de dados que está vinculada à <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The GetData method returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object independent of whether the data source was specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método GetData devolve um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>objeto independente da se a origem de dados foi especificada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control without automatically converting special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conteúdo entre a abertura e fecho do controlo sem automaticamente converter carateres especiais para os respetivos equivalentes entidades HTML.

trans-unit.source: If the length of the string representing the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property string is greater than zero, then IsBoundUsingDataSourceID returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o comprimento de cadeia que representa o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>cadeia de propriedade é maior que zero, em seguida, devolve IsBoundUsingDataSourceID `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the items listed in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que contém os itens listados num <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Use the Items collection to manage the items listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar a coleção de itens para gerir os itens listados no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically add items to, remove items from, and insert items into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Através de programação pode adicionar itens a remover itens da e inserir itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Items collection is commonly used to iterate through the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: A colecção de itens costuma é utilizada para iterar através de itens a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: For example, when multiple items are selected, you can iterate through the Items collection to determine which items are selected.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando forem selecionados múltiplos itens, pode voltar através da coleção de itens para determinar quais os itens selecionados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection"></xref> that contains the items listed in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection"> </xref> que contém os itens listados num <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Processa os dados de nova colocação para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method checks whether the postback data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: As verificações de método LoadPostData se os dados de nova colocação o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo é diferente do respetivo valor anterior e, se assim for, devolve `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is `false`, indicating a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, then the LoadPostData method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>propriedade é `false`, que indica uma seleção único <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo, em seguida, as verificações de método LoadPostData o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is `true`, indicating a multiple-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, then the LoadPostData method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>propriedade é `true`, que indica uma seleção múltipla <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo, em seguida, as verificações de método LoadPostData o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O método LoadPostData é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo expandir a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.target: O identificador da chave para o controlo.

trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os valores de nome de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Restores the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's view state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: Restaura o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> vista do controlo informações de estado de uma página anterior do pedido que foi guardada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado principalmente pela infraestrutura do .NET Framework e não se destina a ser utilizado diretamente a partir do seu código.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, os programadores do controlo podem substituir este método para especificar a forma como um controlo de servidor personalizado restaura o estado de visualização.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral da gestão de estado de ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's view state is stored as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>Estado de visualização do controlo é armazenado como uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>campo a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto contém os <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>Estado de vista de base do controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>campo a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto contém os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>coleção representado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>campo a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto contém os índices selecionados representados pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to restore the control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: O método de LoadViewState chama a classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para restaurar o estado de vista de base do controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O método LoadViewState é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo expandir a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o estado de controlo a ser restaurado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected concurrently in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se vários itens podem ser seleccionados em simultâneo a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Use the Multiple property to specify whether multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade vários para especificar se vários itens podem ser seleccionados em simultâneo no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo é apresentado como uma caixa de lista pendente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the Multiple property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se permitir que vários seleções (definindo a propriedade vários `true`) ou especificar uma altura maior do que uma linha (definindo a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>propriedade para um valor superior ao `1`), o controlo é apresentado como uma caixa de listagem.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar os itens selecionados num <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo que permite que vários seleções em simultâneo, itere através de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção e teste a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de cada item.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `multiple` attribute is rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control only if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O `multiple` atributo é composto no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlar apenas se esta propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se vários itens podem ser simultaneamente selecionados a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unique identifier name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de identificador exclusivo associado a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Use the Name property to determine the unique identifier name for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de nome para determinar o nome de identificador exclusivo para um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the `get` accessor returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Nesta implementação, o `get` acessor devolve o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, the `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o `set` acessor não atribui um valor para esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property because the Name property must have the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to work properly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O `set` acessor não atribuir um valor para esta propriedade porque a propriedade Name tem de ter o mesmo valor que o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo funcione corretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: O nome de identificador exclusivo associado a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event is raised when data is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>evento é gerado quando estão vinculado a dados para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Este método notifica o controlo para efetuar qualquer lógica de enlace de dados associada à mesma.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the OnDataBinding method creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection from the data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, o método OnDataBinding cria o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção da origem de dados especificada no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnDataBinding method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDataBinding também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> que contém os dados do evento.
