trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> evento para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: O método ' OnInit notifica o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo para efetuar quaisquer passos de inicialização que são necessárias para criar e configurar uma instância.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property is `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>propriedade é `false` e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A>propriedade é `true`, em seguida, a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"> </xref> evento para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The OnLoad method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that it should perform actions common to each HTTP request for the page it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: O método de OnLoad notifica o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlar que deve executar ações comuns para cada pedido HTTP para a página que está associada.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The OnLoad method connects the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to the appropriate data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método de OnLoad liga o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo para a origem de dados adequada especificada no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property is to specify the data source control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control should use to retrieve its data source, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method is set as the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>é propriedade para especificar a origem de dados, controlar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo deve utilizar para obter a respetiva origem de dados, em seguida, a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>método está definido como o processador de eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> evento para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property is greater than 1, then the OnPreRender method registers the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> control as one that requires postback processing.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>propriedade for superior a 1, em seguida, regista o método OnPreRender o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlar com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>controlo que aquele que requer processamento originem.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe fornecer um processador personalizado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event is raised when the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>evento é desencadeado quando os itens selecionados a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>alteração de controlo entre pedidos POST para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event is raised only when the user initiates a post to the server, such as by clicking a Submit button.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Este evento é desencadeado apenas quando o utilizador inicia um pedido post para o servidor, tal como ao clicar num botão de envio.

trans-unit.source: This event does not cause a post to the server to occur.
trans-unit.target: Este evento não irá causar um pedido post para o servidor para ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O controlo tem de ter o estado de visualização ativado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>eventos funcione corretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform data validation on the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control when the user changes the selection in the control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para efetuar a validação de dados no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlar quando o utilizador altera a seleção no controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnServerChange method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnServerChange também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange*> method to signal the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange*>método para assinalar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo que o estado do controlo é alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange*>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O método RaisePostDataChangedEvent é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo expandir a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's attributes to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Compõe a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> atributos do controlo especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The RenderAttributes method renders the `name` attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control directly to ensure that it has the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderAttributes compõe o `name` atributo do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo diretamente para se certificar de que tem o mesmo valor que o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: After rendering the attribute, the RenderAttributes method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Depois do atributo de composição, o método de RenderAttributes chama a classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RenderAttributes method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderAttributes é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo expandir a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que recebe o conteúdo composto.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's child controls to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Compõe a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> subordinado controlos do controlo especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The RenderChildren method overrides the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method without calling the base method.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderChildren substitui a classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>método sem chamar o método base.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each of the `<option>` elements between the opening and closing `<select>` tags is rendered with a `value` attribute, a `selected` attribute if the item is selected, and its associated text.
trans-unit.target: Cada um do `<option>` elementos entre a abertura e fecho `<select>` etiquetas é composto com um `value` atributo, um `selected` atributo se o item está selecionado e o respetivo texto associado.

trans-unit.source: If multiple items were selected but the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is set to `false`, then an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se tiverem sido selecionados vários itens, mas a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>propriedade está definida como `false`, em seguida, um <xref:System.Web.HttpException>exceção é emitida.</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que recebe o conteúdo composto.

trans-unit.source: Multiple items were selected but the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Foram selecionados vários itens, mas a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple*>propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control needs to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo tem de vincular à respetiva origem de dados especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control uses the RequiresDataBinding property to determine whether the control needs to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo utiliza a propriedade RequiresDataBinding para determinar se o controlo tem de chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>método para vincular à respetiva origem de dados especificada.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Each time the `set` accessor is called on either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to change the data source after the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> method has already been called, ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the RequiresDataBinding property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que o `set` acessor denomina-se no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>propriedade para alterar a origem de dados após a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A>método já foi chamado, ASP.NET define automaticamente o valor da propriedade RequiresDataBinding para `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the RequiresDataBinding property is also set to `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade RequiresDataBinding também é definido como `true` quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>método é invocado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the RequiresDataBinding property to `false` immediately after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET define automaticamente o valor da propriedade RequiresDataBinding para `false` imediatamente após o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>método foi chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control needs to bind to a data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo tem de vincular a uma origem de dados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves any <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control view state changes that have occurred since the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Guarda qualquer <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> alterações de estado de visualização do controlo ter ocorrido uma vez que a página foi publicada para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's view state is stored as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>Estado de visualização do controlo é armazenado como uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>campo a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto contém os <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>Estado de vista de base do controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>campo a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto contém os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>coleção representado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>campo a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto contém os índices selecionados representados pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to save the control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: O método de SaveViewState chama a classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para guardar o estado de vista de base do controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O método SaveViewState é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo expandir a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que contém as alterações para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> estado de visualização.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the object, this method returns a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma vista de estado está associada com o objeto, este método devolve uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Selects multiple items of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona vários itens do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items*>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The Select method selects multiple items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O método Select seleciona vários itens do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Int32> that contains the items to select.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Array>do tipo <xref:System.Int32>que contém os itens para selecionar.</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ordinal index of the selected item in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice do item selecionado no ordinal um <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndex property is commonly used to determine the index of the selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SelectedIndex é normalmente utilizada para determinar o índice do item selecionado na seleção do único <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: This index can then be used to retrieve the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Este índice, em seguida, pode ser utilizado para obter o item a partir de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is set to `true`, indicating that multiple items can be concurrently selected, the SelectedIndex property contains the index of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, que indica que vários itens podem ser selecionados em simultâneo, a propriedade SelectedIndex contém o índice do primeiro item selecionado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items from an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar os itens selecionados a partir de um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo que permite que vários seleções em simultâneo, itere através de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção e teste a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de cada item.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > It is possible to have no item selected.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > É possível ter nenhum item selecionado.

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected, the SelectedIndex property contains a value of `-1`.
trans-unit.target: Se está selecionado nenhum item, a propriedade SelectedIndex contém um valor de `-1`.

trans-unit.source: This commonly occurs when the page first loads and an item is not selected by default.
trans-unit.target: Esta situação ocorre normalmente quando a página for carregada pela primeira vez e um item não está selecionado por predefinição.

trans-unit.source: Provide code to test this value before referencing the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Forneça o código para testar este valor antes de a referenciar o item no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an exception is thrown if the index is out of the range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, é emitida uma exceção se o índice está fora do intervalo da coleção.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo é apresentado como uma caixa de lista pendente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se permitir que vários seleções (definindo a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>propriedade para `true`) ou especificar uma altura maior do que uma linha (definindo a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>propriedade para um valor superior ao `1`), o controlo é apresentado como uma caixa de listagem.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a drop-down list box is displayed, an item is always selected.
trans-unit.target: Se é apresentada uma caixa de lista pendente, um item está sempre selecionado.

trans-unit.source: If a list box is displayed, you can programmatically clear the selection from all items by setting the SelectedIndex property to `-1`.
trans-unit.target: Se é apresentada uma caixa de lista, através de programação pode desmarcar a seleção de todos os itens definindo a propriedade SelectedIndex `-1`.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal index of the selected item in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item selecionado no ordinal um <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref> indicates that no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref> indica que está selecionado nenhum item.

trans-unit.source: The property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control or less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade foi definida como um valor superior ao número de itens no <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo ou inferior a <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que contém os índices baseado em zero de todos os itens actualmente seleccionados no <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndices property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class to return a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SelectedIndices é utilizada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>classe para devolver uma coleção que contém todos os índices baseado em zero atualmente selecionado itens a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class can override the SelectedIndices property to provide a custom algorithm for returning currently selected items.
trans-unit.target: Controlar os programadores expandir a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>classe pode substituir a propriedade SelectedIndices para fornecer um algoritmo personalizado para devolver atualmente itens selecionados.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém todos os índices baseado em zero atualmente selecionado itens a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selected items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os itens selecionados a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> alteração de controlo entre pedidos POST para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The ServerChange event is raised when the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O ServerChange o evento é gerado quando os itens selecionados a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>alteração de controlo entre pedidos POST para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control must have view state enabled for the ServerChange event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O controlo tem de ter o estado de visualização ativado para o evento de ServerChange funcione corretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height (in rows) of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura (em linhas) da <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Use the Size property to specify the height (in rows) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de tamanho para especificar a altura (em linhas) da <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you specify a size that is smaller than the number of items in the control, scroll bars are displayed to allow you to move up and down the list.
trans-unit.target: Se especificar um tamanho que seja inferior ao número de itens no controlo, são apresentadas barras de deslocamento para lhe permitir mover para cima e baixo na lista.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo é apresentado como uma caixa de lista pendente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the Size property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se permitir que vários seleções (definindo a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>propriedade `true`) ou especificar uma altura maior do que uma linha (definindo a propriedade de tamanho para um valor maior do que `1`), o controlo é apresentado como uma caixa de listagem.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.target: O método TrackViewState persistir itens a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlo para ver o estado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex*> property of the control to the index of the first item in the list with the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do item selecionado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo ou define o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex*>propriedade do controlo para o índice do primeiro item na lista com o valor especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The Value property is commonly used to get the value of the item referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Value costuma é utilizada para obter o valor do item referenciado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If no item is selected in the control, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se está selecionado nenhum item no controlo da, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>é devolvido.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is updated with the index of the first item in the list that contains that value.
trans-unit.target: Se definir esta propriedade para um valor, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade é atualizada com o índice do primeiro item na lista que contém esse valor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no matching value is found, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Não se for encontrado nenhum valor correspondente, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade for deixada inalterada.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O valor do item selecionado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected in the control, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se está selecionado nenhum item no controlo da, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> é devolvido.
